verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2250><s%>, Of Those Days, <S%G1565><s%> As Was Teaching <S%G1321><s%> He <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Announcing The Glad Tidings, <S%G2097><s%> Came Up <S%G2186><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders, <S%G4245><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Spoke <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Tell <S%G2036><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> What <S%G4169><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Thou Doest, <S%G4160><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> It Is <S%G2076><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1849><s%> This Authority? <S%G3778><s%>

<S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Will Ask <S%G2065><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> I Also <S%G2504><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Thing, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tell <S%G2036><s%> Me, <S%G3427><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> Baptism <S%G908><s%> Of John <S%G2491><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Was It <S%G2258><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Men? <S%G444><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Reasoned <S%G4817><s%> Among <S%G4314><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> We Should Say <S%G2036><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> He Will Say <S%G2046><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Ye Not Believe <S%G4100><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1437><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> We Should Say <S%G2036><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Will Stone <S%G2642><s%> Us; <S%G2248><s%> <S%G3982><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For They Are Persuaded That <S%G2076><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> A Prophet <S%G4396><s%> Was. <S%G1511><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G611><s%> They Answered <S%G3361><s%> They Knew Not <S%G1492><s%> Whence. <S%G4159><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Tell 3004 V-PAI-1S You 5213 P-2DP By 1722 PREP What 4169 I-DSF Authority 1849 N-DSF These Things 5023 D-APN I Do. 4160 V-PAI-1S

<S%G756><s%> And He Began <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> To Speak <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3850><s%> This Parable : <S%G3778><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Planted <S%G5452><s%> A Vineyard, <S%G290><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Let Out <S%G1554><s%> It <S%G846><s%> To Husbandmen, <S%G1092><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Left The Country <S%G589><s%> <S%G5550><s%> For A Long Time. <S%G2425><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Season <S%G2540><s%> He Sent <S%G649><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Husbandmen <S%G1092><s%> A Bondman, <S%G1401><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Vineyard <S%G290><s%> They Might Give <S%G1325><s%> To Him; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Husbandmen <S%G1092><s%> Having Beat <S%G1194><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Sent Him Away <S%G1821><s%> Empty. <S%G2756><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Added <S%G4369><s%> To Send <S%G3992><s%> Another <S%G2087><s%> Bondman; <S%G1401><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Also Him <S%G2548><s%> Having Beat <S%G1194><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Dishonoured Him <S%G818><s%> Sent Him Away <S%G1821><s%> Empty. <S%G2756><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Added <S%G4369><s%> To Send <S%G3992><s%> A Third; <S%G5154><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Him <S%G5126><s%> Having Wounded <S%G5135><s%> Cast Him Out. <S%G1544><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And Said <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Vineyard, <S%G290><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Shall I Do? <S%G4160><s%> I Will Send <S%G3992><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> My Son <S%G3450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beloved; <S%G27><s%> Perhaps <S%G2481><s%> Him <S%G5126><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> They Will Respect. <S%G1788><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> But Having Seen <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Husbandmen <S%G1092><s%> Reasoned <S%G1260><s%> Among <S%G4314><s%>, Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heir; <S%G2818><s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> Let Us Kill <S%G615><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ours <S%G2257><s%> May Become <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Inheritance. <S%G2817><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Cast Forth <S%G1544><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Outside <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Vineyard <S%G290><s%> They Killed Him. <S%G615><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Will Do <S%G4160><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Vineyard? <S%G290><s%>

He Will Come <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Destroy <S%G622><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1092><s%> These Husbandmen, <S%G5128><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Give <S%G1325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Vineyard <S%G290><s%> To Others. <S%G243><s%> <S%G191><s%> And Having Heard It <S%G1161><s%>, They Said, <S%G2036><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> May It Be! <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Looking At <S%G1689><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> This, <S%G5124><s%> The Stone <S%G3037><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Rejected <S%G593><s%> They That <S%G3588><s%> Build, <S%G3618><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1096><s%> Is Become <S%G1519><s%> Head <S%G2776><s%> Of The Corner? <S%G1137><s%>

Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Falls <S%G4098><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> <S%G4917><s%> ' Will Be Broken, <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But On Whomsoever <S%G302><s%> It May Fall <S%G4098><s%> It Will Grind To Powder <S%G3039><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Sought <S%G2212><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> To Lay <S%G1911><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hands <S%G5495><s%> <S%G1722><s%> In <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That Hour, <S%G5610><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Feared <S%G5399><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People; <S%G2992><s%> <S%G1097><s%> For They Knew <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Against <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3850><s%> This Parable <S%G3778><s%> He Speaks. <S%G2036><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Watched Him <S%G3906><s%> They Sent <S%G649><s%> Secret Agents, <S%G1455><s%> Feigning <S%G5271><s%> Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> To Be, <S%G1511><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Might Take Hold <S%G1949><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> In Discourse, <S%G3056><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The End <S%G3588><s%> To Deliver Up <S%G3860><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G746><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Governor. <S%G2232><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> We Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Rightly <S%G3723><s%> Thou Sayest <S%G3004><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Teachest, <S%G1321><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Acceptest Not Any Man's <S%G2983><s%> Person, <S%G4383><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> ' With <S%G1909><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Teachest : <S%G1321><s%>
Is It Lawful <S%G1832><s%> For Us <S%G2254><s%> To Caesar <S%G2541><s%> Tribute <S%G5411><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Not? <S%G3756><s%>

<S%G2657><s%> But Perceiving <S%G1161><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Craftiness <S%G3834><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Do Ye Tempt? <S%G3985><s%>

Show <S%G1925><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> A Denarius : <S%G1220><s%> Whose <S%G5101><s%> Has It <S%G2192><s%> Image <S%G1504><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Inscription? <S%G1923><s%> <S%G611><s%> And Answering <S%G1161><s%>, They Said, <S%G2036><s%> Caesar's. <S%G2541><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%>, To Them, <S%G846><s%> Render <S%G591><s%> Therefore <S%G5106><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Of Caesar <S%G2541><s%> To Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Were Not Able <S%G2480><s%> <S%G1949><s%> To Take Hold <S%G846><s%> Of His Speech <S%G4487><s%> Before <S%G1726><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People; <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wondering <S%G2296><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G612><s%> His Answer <S%G846><s%> They Were Silent. <S%G4601><s%>

<S%G4334><s%> And Having Come To Him <S%G1161><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sadducees, <S%G4523><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Deny <S%G483><s%> <S%G386><s%> A Resurrection <S%G3361><s%> There Is, <S%G1511><s%> They Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> Wrote <S%G1125><s%> To Us, <S%G2254><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone's <S%G5100><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> Should Die <S%G599><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Wife, <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Childless <S%G815><s%> Should Die, <S%G599><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Should Take <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wife <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Should Raise Up <S%G1817><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> To His Brother. <S%G846><s%>

Seven <S%G2033><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> There Were, <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> A Wife <S%G1135><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> Childless; <S%G815><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Took <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second <S%G1208><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Woman, <S%G1135><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> Childless; <S%G815><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Third <S%G5154><s%> Took <S%G2983><s%> Her; <S%G846><s%> <S%G5615><s%> And Likewise <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Leave <S%G2641><s%> Children, <S%G5043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Died; <S%G599><s%>
Last <S%G5305><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Died <S%G599><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman. <S%G1135><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Therefore In The <S%G3767><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Of Which <S%G5101><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> Does She Become <S%G1096><s%> Wife? <S%G1135><s%> <S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Had <S%G2192><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> As Wife. <S%G1135><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> Of This Age <S%G5127><s%> Marry <S%G1060><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Are Given In Marriage; <S%G1548><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But Those <S%G1161><s%> Accounted Worthy <S%G2661><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> That Age <S%G1565><s%> To Obtain <S%G5177><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> Marry <S%G1060><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> Are Given In Marriage; <S%G1548><s%>

Neither <S%G3777><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Die <S%G599><s%> Any More <S%G2089><s%> They Can; <S%G1410><s%> <S%G2465><s%> For Equal To Angels <S%G1063><s%> They Are, <S%G1526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Resurrection <S%G386><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Being. <S%G5607><s%>

<S%G3754><s%> But That <S%G1161><s%> Are Raised <S%G1453><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead, <S%G3498><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> Shewed In The Part <S%G3377><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bush, <S%G942><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> He Called The <S%G3004><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Abraham <S%G11><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Isaac <S%G2464><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of Jacob; <S%G2384><s%>

<S%G2316><s%> But God <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Is Not <S%G2076><s%> Of The Dead, <S%G3498><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Of The Living; <S%G2198><s%> <S%G3956><s%> For All <S%G1063><s%> For Him <S%G846><s%> Live. <S%G2198><s%>
Answering <S%G611><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%>, Said, <S%G2036><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> Thou Hast Spoken. <S%G2036><s%>
Not Any More <S%G3765><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Did They Dare <S%G5111><s%> To Ask <S%G1905><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Anything. (lit. Nothing.) <S%G3762><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Do They Say <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of David <S%G1138><s%> Is? <S%G1511><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Book <S%G976><s%> Of Psalms, <S%G5568><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> To My Lord, <S%G3450><s%> Sit <S%G2521><s%> On <S%G1537><s%> <S%G1188><s%> My Right Hand, <S%G3450><s%>
<S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> I Place <S%G5087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2190><s%> Thine Enemies As <S%G4675><s%> A Footstool <S%G5286><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> For Thy Feet. <S%G4675><s%>

<S%G191><s%> And As Were Listening <S%G1161><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His, <S%G846><s%>
